urlLink XBT Tracker The latest version is 0.0.6 [May 21, 2004] Overview XBT Tracker is a BitTorrent tracker written in C++. It's designed to offer high performance while consuming little resources (CPU and RAM). It's a pure tracker, so it doesn't offer a frontend. You can use any (PHP) frontend you want. XBT Tracker listens on port 2710. The announce URL is http://...:2710/announce. The debug URL is http://...:2710/debug. The scrape URL is http://...:2710/scrape. An experimental UDP tracker extension is also supported via announce URL udp://...:2710.
